about.heading: About us
about.description:
Oasis mission is to provide the best and most trusted entry point to deploy your capital. We are building Oasis.app to let our users benefit from all of the potential in DeFi.

 Our team is made of passionate thinkers and builders.

gas-explanation: The Max gas fee is the maximum that will be paid in gas for the transaction. We want your transactions to succeed, so we provide a max gas price of 2x the current base fee + a priority fee that will get you in the next block in 95% of the times. In most cases you will pay a lot less than this maximum.

ledger-error: There was an error, please reset

card.collateralization-ratio-calculated: Your collateralization ratio is calculated by: value of your collateral / Dai debt.
card.collateralization-ratio-description: The price used to calculate the value of your collateral is the price obtained from the Maker oracles. Your collateralization ratio needs to be above the minimum required at all times to not get liquidated.
card.collateralization-ratio-next-price: Collateralization ratio on the next price will be:
card.collateral-locked-amount: The total amount of collateral locked in your vault is:
card.collateral-locked-USD: The total value in dollars of the collateral in your vault is:
card.collateral-locked-oracles: We use the current price from the Maker oracles to calculate this value. The current market price of your collateral may differ from this price.

simulate.footnote1: *Past performance is not indicative of future results.
simulate.footnote2: **Prior year estimates use the 90 day APY.

modal.para1: Your collateralization ratio is calculated by: value of your collateral / Dai debt. The minimum active col. ratio is the ratio under which no further debt can be generated, nor collateral withdrawn. This is separate from the liquidation ratio.
modal.para2: If a vault is under the min. active col. ratio, collateral can be deposit and debt paid back.
modal.para3: The min. active col. ratio price displayed is the price of the collateral at this ratio.

tooltip.vaultId: The Vault ID is a unique reference for your Maker Vault in Oasis.app.
tooltip.stabilityFee: The Maker Protocol collects a Stability Fee on Dai that is generated from Maker Vaults. It is a variable-rate fee that changes when Maker’s governing body votes on proposals put forth by Risk Teams.
tooltip.liquidationFee:
If your vault is liquidated, a liquidation penalty is added to your vault’s total outstanding debt in Dai, which results in more collateral being sold to cover the outstanding debt. This is done to incentivize vaults owners to avoid liquidation.
The size of the liquidation penalty is determined by the Liquidation Fee which is calculated based on the debt in the vault.
tooltip.min-collateral: This is also called the Liquidation Ratio. If the Vault reaches below the minimum collateralization level it is considered undercollateralized and is subject to liquidation. Your collateral will then be partially auctioned off to cover outstanding debt and liquidation fee.
tooltip.dust-limit: The Dust Limit specifies the minimum amount of DAI that can be minted for this type of Vault. This value is also called the "Debt Floor".

card.liquidation-price-description: The Liquidation Price specifies the collateral price where your vault is subject to liquidation. If you think your vault is too close to liquidation price you can change your multiply vault to have a higher collateralization ratio, you can add more collateral on your own, or you can pay back some of your Dai debt.
card.liquidation-price-description-AUTO: The Liquidation Price is the price at which a Vault becomes vulnerable to liquidation.
card.vault-protection-description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Felis, dictum est non quisque aenean ac velit adipiscing.
card.liquidation-percentage-below: That is {{percentageBelow}} below the current price
card.buying-power-description: This is how much DAI you can use to buy more collateral right now. Buying Power specifies the maximum of Dai you can buy more collateral with based on the current state of your position. It is calculated by taking the maximum DAI available to you, using it to purchase more collateral, and locking the collateral back into the vault.
card.current-price-description: This is the current price of your vault collateral supplied by the Maker price oracles. There is a one hour delay before the oracle price is made current in the Maker Protocol.
card.next-price-description:
Here you can see the next price that will go into effect in the Maker Protocol. Compare this with the Liquidation Price to see whether your vault will be liquidated on the next price update.
{{nextPrice}}
card.more-info-oracles: More information on Maker oracles can be found <0>here</0>
card.based-on-price: The current net value is calculated based on the market price of
card.based-on-price-lp: The current net value is calculated based on the oracle price of
card.market-price-unavailable: Market price temporally unavailable, please check later
card.formula: The profit & loss is calculated by the following formula: P&L = ((Net value + Cumulative value of the withdrawals - Gas fees spent) - Cumulative value of the deposits) / Cumulative value of the deposits
card.net-value-description:
The Net Value is calculated as the current value of the collateral in your vault minus the current debt.
Note: This will not be exactly equal to the amount you will receive if you close your vault to Dai. This is due to fees applied when swapping collateral to Dai. The Net Value is calculated using the market price for the collateral using 1Inch.
card.deposit-collateral-on-vault-under-debt-f: You cannot deposit to your vault while it is below the minimum debt required of {{debtFloor}}. To add more collateral, generate Dai to get above the minimum required. Learn more about the Minimum Vault Debt here <0>here</0>)
card.current-stop-loss-coll-ratio: The current Stop-Loss Collateral Ratio is:
card.stop-loss-coll-ratio-desc: The Stop-Loss Collateral Ratio is the trigger point for executing the Stop-Loss on this Vault based on the Collateral Ratio at the next OSM price. Should the next OSM price take the current Vault Collateralisation Ratio below the Stop-Loss Collateral Ratio, then the Vault will be automatically closed.
card.dynamic-stop-loss-price-desc: The dynamic stop-loss price is the current price at which this Vault will be closed based on the set Stop-Loss Collateralisation Ratio. The reason this price is dynamic is that the Stop-Loss trigger is based on a collateralisation ratio, so when the Vault is adjusted, or Stability Fees accrue, it automatically adjusts the price at which the Stop-Loss will trigger.
card.current-dynamic-stop-loss-price: The current Dynamic Stop-Loss Price is:
card.max-token-on-stop-loss-trigger-desc: The estimated {{token}} on Stop-Loss trigger is the approximate amount of {{token}} you can expect to get returned to the wallet when the Vault has been closed because of Stop-Loss. It is very difficult to give a perfect amount as it depends on several factors at the time of the Stop-Loss trigger, such as market price, available liquidity and gas costs. This calculation assumes a 2% difference from Trigger Price to Market Price. The amount saved compared to liquidation is based on the assumption of not paying a Liquidation Penalty, currently set to {{liquidationPenalty}}.

manage-earn-vault.earnings-to-date-modal: The earnings to date of the position. Calculated as the current net value of the position, minus the cumulative deposits, plus the cumulative withdrawals, and not accounting for the Oasis fees. The 'After fees' value is accounting for the earnings including the Oasis fee, and the Ethereum Gas fees.
manage-earn-vault.net-apy-modal: The annual percentage yield, accounting for fees.  Calculated as the percentage price increase of the {{ token }} token over the last 7 days, annualised, and subtracting the variable annual fee.
manage-earn-vault.exposure-modal: The total exposure of the position, expressed as a multiple of the capital deployed.

vault-errors.deposit-amount-exceeds-collateral-balanc: You cannot deposit more collateral than the amount in your wallet
vault-errors.deposit-dai-amount-exceeds-dai-balance: You cannot deposit more Dai than the amount in your wallet
vault-errors.generate-amount-exceeds-dai-yield-from-d: The collateralization ratio for this Maker Vault will be too low. Please generate less Dai
The collateralization ratio for this Maker Vault will be too low at the next price update. Please generate less Dai
vault-errors.generate-amount-exceeds-debt-ceiling: You are trying to generate more than the current debt ceiling allows. The amount of Dai that can be generated is {{maxGenerateAmount}}
vault-errors.generate-amount-less-than-debt-floor: This vault type requires a minimum of {{debtFloor}} Dai to be generated. Read more about the Minimum Vault Debt <0>here</0>.
vault-errors.generate-amount-more-than-max-flash-amou: This transaction exceeds the maximum flash loan amount of {{maxFlashAmount}}, please lower the multiple, or deposit amount.
vault-errors.debt-will-be-less-than-debt-floor: The Maker Vault debt amount either must be 0 or exceed {{debtFloor}} amount of Dai. Please change your payback amount
vault-errors.custom-allowance-amount-exceeds-maxuint2: Allowance too large. Please decrease custom allowance amount
vault-errors.custom-allowance-amount-less-than-deposi: You need at least an allowance of your deposit amount to continue
vault-errors.depositing-all-eth-balance: You need some ETH to pay for the gas fees. Lower your deposit amount
vault-errors.ledger-enable-contract-data: Please enable Contract data on the Ledgers Ethereum app Settings
vault-errors.insufficient-eth-balance: Your ETH balance is too low to pay for transaction
vault-errors.exchange-error: Could not fetch exchange prices for doing this multiply action.
vault-errors.generate-amount-exceeds-dai-yield-from-t: The collateralization ratio for this Maker Vault is too low. Please generate less Dai
The collateralization ratio for this Maker Vault is too low at the next price update. Please generate less Dai
vault-errors.payback-amount-exceeds-dai-balance: You cannot payback more Dai than the amount in your wallet
vault-errors.payback-amount-exceeds-vault-debt: You are trying to payback more than your Dai debt for this Maker Vault
vault-errors.custom-collateral-allowance-amount-excee: Allowance too large. Please decrease custom allowance amount
vault-errors.custom-collateral-allowance-amount-less-: You need at least an allowance of your deposit amount to continue
vault-errors.custom-dai-allowance-amount-exceeds-maxu: Allowance too large. Please decrease custom allowance amount
vault-errors.custom-dai-allowance-amount-less-than-pa: You need at least an allowance of your payback amount to continue
vault-errors.withdraw-collateral-on-vault-under-debt-: You cannot withdraw from your vault while it is below the minimum required of {{debtFloor}} Dai. To withdraw your collateral, payback your debt fully. Learn more about the Minimum Vault Debt <0>here</0>.
vault-errors.has-to-deposit-collateral-on-empty-vault: There is no collateral in this vault. Please first add collateral by choosing 'Manage collateral' option in select.
vault-errors.deposit-collateral-on-vault-under-debt-f: You cannot deposit to your vault while it is below the minimum debt required of {{debtFloor}}. To add more collateral, generate Dai to get above the minimum required. Learn more about the Minimum Vault Debt here <0>here</0>)
vault-errors.invalid-slippage: Custom slippage set too high for this transaction, please reduce your slippage setting
vault-errors.after-coll-ratio-below-stop-loss-ratio: You cannot make adjustments to your Vault which take it below your Stop-Loss Col. Ratio at current or next collateral price
vault-errors.after-coll-ratio-below-basic-sell-ratio: You cannot make adjustments to your vault that would trigger your Auto-Sell at the current or next price. Please adjust your Auto-Sell Trigger ratio first
vault-errors.after-coll-ratio-above-basic-buy-ratio: You cannot make adjustments to your vault that would trigger your Auto-Buy at the current or next price. Please adjust your Auto-Buy Trigger ratio first
vault-errors.vault-will-be-taken-under-min-active-col: You cannot make adjustments to your vault which take it below your minimum active coll. ratio at current or next collateral price
vault-errors.stop-loss-near-liquidation-ratio: Your Stop-Loss Trigger Col. Ratio would cause closing vault immediately. If this is intended, close your vault
vault-errors.stop-loss-max-debt: The Stop-Loss cannot be created due to the high price impact of the order. Your total vault debt has to be less than 20m DAI
vault-errors.target-coll-ratio-exceeded-dust-limit-co: You cannot select a higher Target Collateralization Ratio, as it would result in the vault hitting the dust limit
vault-errors.auto-buy-max-price-requred: Please enter a maximum buy price or select <1>Set No Threshold<1>
vault-errors.minimum-sell-price-not-provided: Please enter a minimum sell price or select <1>Set No Threshold<1>
vault-errors.auto-sell-trigger-higher-than-auto-buy-t: Setting your an Auto-Sell trigger at this level could result in it being executed by your Auto-Buy. Please adjust your Auto-Buy Target ratio first
vault-errors.stop-loss-trigger-higher-than-auto-buy-t: Setting your an Stop-Loss trigger at this level could result in it being executed by your Auto-Buy. Please adjust your Auto-Buy Target ratio first
vault-errors.auto-buy-trigger-lower-than-auto-sell-ta: Setting your an Auto-Buy trigger at this level could result in it being executed by your Auto-Sell. Please adjust your Auto-Sell Target ratio first

vault-warnings.potential-generate-amount-less-than-debt: Minimum Dai required to open a Vault is {{debtFloor}}. Please add more collateral to generate {{debtFloor}} Dai
vault-warnings.debt-is-less-than-debt-floor: Your current Dai debt is below the minimum of {{debtFloor}}. Because of this some Vault actions are not possible. Please generate more Dai to take you above the minimum or payback all your debt
vault-warnings.vault-will-be-at-risk-level-danger: With this action your vault will be at a collateralization ratio very close to the minimum required
vault-warnings.vault-will-be-at-risk-level-danger-at-ne: With this action your vault will be at a collateralization ratio very close to the minimum required at the next price update
vault-warnings.vault-will-be-at-risk-level-warning: With this action your vault will be at a collateralization ratio near the minimum required
vault-warnings.vault-will-be-at-risk-level-warning-at-n: With this action your vault will be at a collateralization ratio near the minimum required at the next price update
vault-warnings.vault-is-currently-under-min-active-col-: Your vault is currently under the min active collateralization ratio at current or next price.  You can decrease the risk of the position, but not increase it.
vault-warnings.vault-will-remain-under-min-active-col-r: You are decreasing risk of this position, but it will remain under the minimum active col ratio.
vault-warnings.insufficient-eth-balance: Your ETH balance is potentially too low to pay for this transaction
vault-warnings.coll-ratio-close-to-current: Your Stop-Loss Trigger Col. Ratio is very close to your current Col. Ratio. Only continue if this is intended and understand your Vault could be closed with a small price change.
vault-warnings.no-min-sell-price-when-stop-loss-enabled: Not setting a Min. Sell Price with Stop-Loss enabled would cause your Stop-Loss to never be triggered
vault-warnings.auto-buy-with-no-max-price-threshold: WARNING: You are setting an auto buy trigger with no maximum buy price threshold
vault-warnings.auto-sell-trigger-close-to-stop-loss-tri: Setting a lower Trigger Ratio would trigger your existing Stop-Loss. If you want to use a lower trigger ratio, please adjust your Stop-Loss trigger first.
vault-warnings.auto-sell-target-close-to-auto-buy-trigg: Setting a higher Target Ratio would trigger your existing Auto-Buy. If you want to use a higher trigger ratio, please adjust your Auto-Buy trigger first.
vault-warnings.stop-loss-trigger-close-to-auto-sell-tri: Setting a higher Trigger Ratio would trigger your existing Auto-Sell. If you want to use a higher trigger ratio, please adjust your Auto-Sell trigger first.
vault-warnings.auto-buy-target-close-to-stop-loss-trigg: Setting a lower Target Ratio would trigger your existing Stop-Loss. If you want to use a lower target ratio, please adjust your Stop-Loss trigger first.
vault-warnings.auto-buy-target-close-to-auto-sell-trigg: Setting a lower Target Ratio would trigger your existing Auto-Sell. If you want to use a lower target ratio, please adjust your Auto-Sell trigger first.
vault-warnings.auto-buy-triggered-immediately: Setting your trigger ratio at this level will cause your Auto-Buy to execute immediately. If this not your intention, please increase your trigger ratio
vault-warnings.auto-sell-triggered-immediately: Setting your trigger ratio at this level will cause your Auto-Sell to execute immediately. If this not your intention, please decrease your trigger ratio
vault-warnings.auto-sell-override: Auto-Sell has been updated to override your Max gas fee if required to prevent vault liquidation. To make use of this protection, please remove your Auto-sell and create a new one. You are eligible for a gas cost refund, please contact <0>support@oasis.app</0>

vault-info-messages.earn-overview: This {{token}} position is earning trading fees in Uniswap V3. The supplied DAI is multiplied by using the Maker protocol, giving the user a bigger exposure to the Uniswap pool. Currently the only actions you can take is to <1>close this Vault</1>.
vault-info-messages.closing: To close your vault, a part of your position will be sold to payback the outstanding debt. The rest of your collateral will be sent to your address.

headers.noVaults: Select a collateral type to create a Maker Vault and borrow Dai or buy additional collateral.
headers.withVaults: Open a new Maker Vault.<0/> Borrow Dai or buy additional collateral.

headers.notConnected-noVaults: {{address}} currently has no Maker Vaults.<0/> Connect your wallet and open a vault.
headers.notConnected-withVaults: Maker Vaults overview of {{address}}.<0/> Connect your wallet.

vaults-overview.subheader-no-vaults: Open a Maker Vault, deposit your collateral, and borrow Dai or buy additional collateral against it.
vaults-overview.subheader-vault-suggestions: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur, adipiscing elit. Ut fringilla dictum nibh etc aliquam dolor sit amet.
vaults-overview.total-assets-subheader: Calculated using the <0>Oasis curated token list →</0>

ownership.subheader1: Please connect your wallet to open, manage or view your Vaults.

liquidating.header1: Your {{ collateral }} Maker Vault {{ id }} is about to get liquidated.
liquidating.header2: {{ collateral }} Maker Vault {{ id }} is about to get liquidated.
liquidating.subheader1: The next price update of {{ collateral }} will cause a liquidation on this Maker Vault unless collateral is added, or Dai is paid back.
liquidating.subheader2: Is this your Maker Vault? Please connect with address: {{ address }} and save your Maker Vault from liquidation.
liquidating.subheader3: This Vault is now available for liquidation and can be liquidated at anytime.

liquidated.subheader1: This Maker Vault has been liquidated. A portion of your collateral has been auctioned to pay back your Dai debt.
liquidated.subheader3: This Maker Vault has been liquidated. A portion of collateral has been auctioned to pay back the Dai debt.
liquidated.subheader4: If this is your vault, connect with address: {{ address }} to reclaim the remaining collateral.

setup-stop-loss.content: Set up a Stop-Loss protection to allow us to automatically stop you out of your position when your vault drops below a chosen collateralization ratio. You can stop both to {{token}} or to DAI.

get-protection.content: Set up Stop-Loss protection or an Auto-Sell to protect your vault from liquidation if it drops below your chosen collateralization ratio.

what-are-the-risks.content: Find out about the underlying creation of the position, the risks, where your capital is at and more in the FAQ section.

open-vault-two-tx-setup-requirement: You will be required to sign 2 transactions. 1 to setup the the Vault and another to set up the Stop-Loss.
open-vault-sl-second-status-not-started-: Transaction will start once 1/2 is confirmed
learn-more-at-oasis: Learn more at Oasis.app Knowledge Base

header.multiply-transition: Multiply your exposure on {{token}} in your vault
header.go-to-multiply: Great, now you will go to the new Multiply interface
header.success: All done! You now have a vault
header.success-manage: All done! Your vault has been updated

subtext.collateral: Deposit or withdraw from your Vault. Save gas by combining transactions.
subtext.dai: Generate DAI from the collateral in your vault, or payback DAI. Save gas by combining transactions.
subtext.edit: Simulate your vault by configuring the amount of collateral to deposit, and DAI to generate.
subtext.edit-multiply: Simulate your vault by configuring the amount of collateral to deposit, and slide your multiply factor.
subtext.edit-multiply-dai: This vault can be created by simply <1>depositing DAI</1>. The transaction will create the {{token}} position for you based on this DAI deposit.
subtext.proxy: With your smart proxy multiple actions can be performed in one transaction for your Vault. This proxy only needs to be set up once. Read more in the <1><2>Knowledge Base</2></1>
subtext.proxy-start: With your smart proxy multiple actions can be performed in one transaction for your Vault. This proxy only needs to be set up once. Read more in the <1>Knowledge Base</1>.
subtext.proxy-success: Your smart Proxy has been successfully set up. Read more in the <1>Knowledge Base →</1>
subtext.proxy-progress: Read more on smart proxy in the <1>Knowledge Base</1>.
subtext.allowance: Specify an allowance to set a maximum on the amount of tokens the vault contracts can interact with.
subtext.daiAllowance: Specify an allowance to set a maximum on the amount of tokens the vault contracts can interact with.
subtext.confirm: This will update your vault to a multiply vault. It does not require a transaction. You will be able to switch it back to the Borrow view.
subtext.review-manage: Here you can review the details of the changes to your vault.
subtext.confirm-in-progress: Your Vault is currently being created.
subtext.modified: Your Vault is currently being updated. Please wait.

oracles.description: Below the current and next prices of the collateral types that are accepted for Maker vaults can be viewed. Most use the Oracle Stability Module (OSM). This module updates the price just once every hour. Therefore, when a crash is happening, users still have an hour to react to the new price.

select-vault-type.header: What do you want to do with your {{token}}?

multiply.subtext: Create a Multiply position and get up to {{exposureMultiplier}}x exposure on your {{token}}

borrow.subtext: Borrow up to {{maxBorrow}} DAI for every $100,000 worth of {{token}}

protection.set-downside-protection-desc: Set the Collateralisation Ratio trigger at the point which you want your Vault to be closed at automatically. Learn more about how Stop-Loss works
protection.cancel-downside-protection-desc: To cancel the Stop-Loss you’ll need to click the button below and confirm the transaction.
protection.setting-downside-protection-desc: Your Vault is currently being updated to add Stop-Loss Protection. Your Vault will not be protected from Liquidation until this completes.
protection.cancelling-downside-protection-desc: The Stop-Loss cancellation is in progress. Once the transaction is done, the Stop-Loss will be removed.
protection.position-again-at-risk: Your position is then at risk of liquidation again once the liquidation price is hit.
protection.downside-protection-complete-desc: You have successfully setup Stop-Loss Protection on your Vault. Find out more about how Stop-Loss works
protection.cancel-protection-complete-desc: Stop-Loss has been cancelled successfully. You can always set up it again to protect your vault. Your position is now again at risk of liquidation once the liquidation price is hit.
protection.banner-content: Setup a dynamic Stop-Loss based on your Collateralisation Ratio to help protect your Vault from liquidation or the worry of big losses.
protection.zero-debt-heading: You need to Generate DAI before you can set up Automated Protection
protection.zero-debt-description: Oasis.app Automated Protection allows you to set up a dynamic Stop-Loss or Auto-Sell Strategy on your vault based on the collateralization ratio. This can protect your vault from liquidation or reduce your exposure to the collateral asset in the case of a sharp downturn in price. Learn more about how it works
protection.below-dust-limit-heading: You need to generate Dai above the minimum debt limit to set up Stop-Loss Protection
protection.not-guaranteed: Automation isn't guaranteed to work 100% of the time
protection.guarantee-factors: Several factor can relate to its success. These include liquidity, volatility and gas.
protection.learn-more-about-automation: Learn more about automation and how Oasis is building the best automation product on Ethereum →
protection.automation-fact: {{success}} of {{total}} Vaults using Automation have successfully been saved the last 90 days
protection.modal-description: You have the Stop-Loss protection enabled. Click on the banner below to see more details.
protection.your-stop-loss-triggered-desc: See below for a summary of what happened to the Vault.
protection.stop-loss-triggered-desc: Your Stop-Loss was triggered on your Vault
protection.stop-loss-triggered-content: Your stop loss was triggered on your Vault. You can read the fully summary of the Stop Loss event on the right.
protection.cancel-notice: Cancelling your Stop-Loss means you will no longer have protection in place and you will need to actively monitor your Collateralisation Ratio.
protection.find-more-about-setting-stop-loss: Find out more about setting Stop-Loss →
protection.sl-triggered-gas-estimation: This fee represents the expected Gas Cost based on the current price of ETH and an assumed Gas Price of 200 GWEI.
protection.coll-ratio-close-to-current: Your Stop-Loss Trigger Col. Ratio is very close to your current Col. Ratio. Only continue if this is intended and understand your Vault could be closed with a small price change.
protection.closed-vault-existing-sl-header: Your vault is closed but stop-loss is still active
protection.closed-vault-existing-sl-description: You can cancel your existing stop-loss here or deposit into your vault in overview tab
protection.closed-vault-not-existing-trigger-header: You need to generate Dai before you can set up Stop-Loss
protection.closed-vault-not-existing-trigger-descri: To enable Stop-Loss you need to generate Dai in overview tab

newsletter.title: Stay up to date with Oasis.app
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe to the newsletter for Oasis updates
newsletter.success: Thank you for subscribing the newsletter!
newsletter.gdpr: By entering your email address, you acknowledge that Oazo Apps Limited will collect and process your personal data for marketing purposes (e.g. newsletter, updates). For more information please refer to our <1>Privacy Policy.</1>

errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.email-is-invalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.email-already-exists: Email is already subscribed to mailing list.
errors.email-pending: Opt-in email already sent for this address - please check your inbox.

slippage-limit.preset-description: Select the amount of slippage you would like.

errors.invalid-slippage: Invalid slippage. Slippage should be in 20%, 0.1% range

warnings.high-slippage: Warning. You have set a high slippage limit which can result in you getting a price quite far from your quoted price. Only continue if you understand this risk.

modal-trezor-eip1559-title: Trezor with Metamask does not support EIP-1559
modal-trezor-eip1559-paragraph1: Oasis.app has recently updated all transactions to support EIP-1559. Doing EIP-1559 transactions with Trezor through metamask is currently not supported, see <0>here</0>.
modal-trezor-eip1559-paragraph2: You can continue to use Metamask with Trezor with legacy transactions on our environment here: <0>legacy.oasis.app</0>.
modal-trezor-eip1559-paragraph3: Alternatively, if you have a Model T Trezor you can <0>connect</0> directly to Oasis.app.

product-card.lowest-annual-fee-cheapest-vault: The lowest Annual Fee and cheapest Vault for borrowing using staked ETH
product-card.staking-rewards: Great for Borrowing or Multiplying while earning staking rewards
product-card.great-borrowing-and-multiplying: Great for Borrowing or Multiplying your {{token}}

guni.GUNIV3DAIUSDC1-A: Get up to {{value}} exposure to the DAI/USDC UNI V3 5bps pool

product-card-title.WBTC-A: wBTC with medium cost and multiple

multiply.title: Oasis Multiply
multiply.description: Multiply your exposure to your favorite crypto assets. Browse our featured products or select a asset.

borrow.title: Oasis Borrow
borrow.description: Borrow Dai against your favorite crypto assets. Use the Dai however you like. Browse the featured, or select an asset to view our products.

earn.title: Oasis Earn
earn.description: Put your crypto assets to work today. Start generating the best yields. Select your Earn product below.

eth.description: ETH facilitates operations on the Ethereum network. It is used by network participants to execute their requested operations on it. We can think about it as the "fuel" of the network. You can maximize your ETH utility by Multiplying your exposure or Borrowing against your ETH.

btc.description: Bitcoin itself cannot be used directly, but needs to be moved onto the Ethereum Blockchain to use it in DeFi. Both wrapped Bitcoin (wbtc) and renBTC deliver the power of Bitcoin with the flexibility of an ERC20 token. Get the most of your Bitcoin Multiplying your exposure or Borrowing.

usdc.description: USDC is a 1:1 USD-backed centralized stablecoin, fully regulated. USDC is natively supported on multiple layer 1 blockchains including Ethereum as an ERC-20 token, Algorand as an ASA token, Solana as a SPL token, TRON as an TRC-20 token, and Stellar as a native asset. It is operated by Circle.

lp-token.description: Tokens deposited into a liquidity pool, automatically generates a new token that represents the share the depositor owns of that pool. This is called a liquidity provider (LP) token, and it can be used to borrow against. This has the effect of multiplying your liquidity share in the pool.

yfi.description: Yearn.finance (YFI) is the governance token of the Yearn.finance platform. The platform is a yield optimizer that moves funds around the decentralized finance ecosystem in an effort to generate a high return. Multiply your exposure to YFI, or borrow against it.

dai.description: Dai is the largest overcollateralized decentralized stablecoin. Dai can be generated on Oasis.app using various collateral types. Here we show the products that will net you returns in DAI.

uni.description: UNI is the governance token of Uniswap Protocol, which is governed by a decentralized community who propose and vote on upgrades to the protocol. Uniswap is a decentralized trading protocol for swapping ERC20 tokens.

link.description: Loopring is an Ethereum token that describes itself as “an open-sourced, audited, and non-custodial exchange protocol.” It aims to allow anyone to build non-custodial, order book-based exchanges on Ethereum by leveraging zero-knowledge proofs.

matic.description: Polygon (MATIC) is an Ethereum token that powers the Polygon Network, a scaling solution for Ethereum. Polygon is a protocol and a framework for building and connecting Ethereum-compatible blockchain networks. Aggregating scalable solutions on Ethereum supporting a multi-chain Ethereum ecosystem.

mana.description: MANA is the ERC-20 token built for Decentraland, a virtual reality platform powered by the ethereum blockchain. It is primarily used to buy goods, services and LAND (an NFT token) within Decentraland.

guni-slippage-overridden: Your custom slippage has been overridden for this vault. GUNI vaults can only be opened with a slippage at 0.1%.
temporary-guni-message: The max multiple for your GUNI position has been increased by Maker governance from 20x to 50x. To take advantage of this you will need to close this vault, and open a new GUNI position. Read more in

asset.label: Asset
asset.tooltip: The identifier of the position asset type, uses the protocols naming conventions.

position-id.label: Position ID
position-id.tooltip: The Position ID is used to reference the position across Oasis.app

collateral-ratio.label: Collateral Ratio
collateral-ratio.tooltip: The value of the collateral in comparison to the amount of debt. Needs to be above the minimum required to avoid liquidation.

dai-debt.label: Dai Debt
dai-debt.tooltip: The amount of dai debt in this position

collateral-locked.label: Collateral Locked
collateral-locked.tooltip: The amount of collateral in this position

variable-perc.label: Variable %
variable-perc.tooltip: The variable annual rate paid over the debt in this position. This can be changed by the governance body of the protocol.

protection.label: Protection
protection.tooltip: Indicates if a Stop-Loss Protection has been set up for this position. If not, you can activate it on the Protection page by clicking the button.

net-value.label: Net Value
net-value.tooltip: The current net value of the position based on the oracle price of the collateral in the position minus the debt.

multiple.label: Multiple
multiple.tooltip: The current multiple of the position. Indicating the extra exposure on the underlying collateral in comparison to holding the collateral without a multiply position.

liquidation-price.label: Liquidation Price
liquidation-price.tooltip: The price of the collateral at which this position becomes vulnerable to liquidation.

funding-cost.label: Funding Cost
funding-cost.tooltip: The cost in percentage of the net value of your multiply position if you were to keep it open for 1 year, without a change in collateral prices. The formula for it is: Dai Debt / Net Value * Variable annual fee.

pnl.label: PnL
pnl.tooltip: The current profit or loss percentage of your position, including incurred gas costs. For a more detailed look on the profit and loss, please check the position.

seven-day-yield.label: 7 Day Yield
seven-day-yield.tooltip: The 7 day yield is the average returns of the past 7 days, annualized, and subtracts any variable rates that need to be paid.

liquidity.label: Liquidity
liquidity.tooltip: The current available liquidity allowing increases of positions.

claim-rewards.title: {{ bonusTokenName }} position rewards
claim-rewards.for-this-position: For this position you are currently earning {{ name }} rewards.

instructions.tokens-to-claim: Press the button to claim {{ readableAmount }}.
instructions.claim-succeeded: You have claimed {{ readableAmount }}. It may take a few minutes for your position to update.
instructions.nothing-to-claim: You currently have no {{ name }} rewards to claim.

help-shape-the-future-of-multiply: Help shape the future of Multiply

simulate-faq.learn-more-body: You can visit our <0>knowledge base</0> page to have a deep dive into this strategy. Or ask more questions to our community on <1>Discord →</1>

basic-buy-sell-generic.max-gas-fee-trans-subheading: Select the maximum gas fee you are willing to spend in Gwei per transaction.

auto-sell.cancel-summary-description: To cancel the Auto-Sell you'll need to click the button below and confirm the transaction.
auto-sell.target-col-ratio-each-sell: Target Col. Ratio after each sell
auto-sell.trigger-col-ratio-to-perfrom-sell: Trigger Col. Ratio to perfrom each automated sell
auto-sell.col-to-be-sold: {{token}} to be sold at next sell
auto-sell.title: Auto-Sell
auto-sell.continual-sell-no-threshold: Recurring sell order with no min
auto-sell.set-trigger-description: You are creating a recurring sell action to trigger at a collateralization ratio of {{execCollRatio}}%, increasing it to your Target Ratio of {{targetCollRatio}}%. Initially it will execute with at ${{executionPrice}}/{{token}}, with a min sell price of ${{minSellPrice}}/{{token}}. Learn More
auto-sell.set-trigger-description-no-threshold: You are creating a recurring sell action to trigger at a collateralization ratio of {{execCollRatio}}%, increasing it to your Target Ratio of {{targetCollRatio}}%. Initially it will execute with at ${{executionPrice}}/{{token}}. With no min sell price. Learn More
auto-sell.closed-vault-existing-trigger-header: Your vault is closed but Auto-Sell is still active
auto-sell.closed-vault-existing-trigger-descriptio: You can cancel your existing Auto-Sell here or deposit into your vault in overview tab
auto-sell.closed-vault-not-existing-trigger-header: You need to generate Dai before you can set up Auto-Sell
auto-sell.closed-vault-not-existing-trigger-descri: To enable Auto-Sell you need to generate Dai in overview tab
auto-sell.adding-new-triggers-disabled: Creation of the new Auto-Sell trigger is currently disabled.
auto-sell.adding-new-triggers-disabled-description: To protect our users, due to extreme adversarial market conditions we have currently disabled setting up NEW Auto-Sell triggers
auto-sell.add-content: Your vault is currently being updated to add your Auto-Sell. Auto-Sell will not be active until this completes.
auto-sell.add-complete-content: You have successfully set up an Auto-Sell on your vault. Find out more about how this works
auto-sell.remove-content: Your Auto-Sell cancellation is in progress. Once the transaction is complete. Your Auto-Sell trigger will be removed.
auto-sell.remove-complete-content: Your Auto-Sell has been successfully cancelled.

banner.content: Set up an Auto-Sell to keep your vault’s collateralization ratio above a certain level. This may be beneficial, for example, in a bear market where the value of your collateral is decreasing. Find out more about how this works

auto-buy.title: Auto-Buy
auto-buy.continual-buy-no-threshold: Recurring buy order with no max
auto-buy.target-col-ratio-each-buy: Target Col. Ratio after each buy
auto-buy.trigger-col-ratio-to-perfrom-buy: Trigger Col. Ratio to perfrom each automated buy
auto-buy.total-cost-of-next-buy: Total cost of next ETH buy
auto-buy.col-to-be-purchased: {{token}} to be purchased at next buy
auto-buy.closed-vault-existing-trigger-header: Your vault is closed but Auto-Buy is still active
auto-buy.closed-vault-existing-trigger-descriptio: You can cancel your existing Auto-Buy here or deposit into your vault in overview tab
auto-buy.adding-new-triggers-disabled: Creation of the new Auto-Buy trigger is currently disabled.
auto-buy.adding-new-triggers-disabled-description: To protect our users, due to extreme adversarial market conditions we have currently disabled setting up NEW Auto-Buy triggers
auto-buy.add-content: Your vault is currently being updated to add your Auto-Buy. Auto-Buy will not be active until this completes.
auto-buy.add-complete-content: You have successfully set up an Auto-Buy on your vault. Find out more about how this works
auto-buy.remove-content: Your Auto-Buy cancellation is in progress. Once the transaction is complete. Your Auto-Buy trigger will be removed.
auto-buy.remove-complete-content: Your Auto-Buy has been successfully cancelled.

banner.content: Set up an Auto-Buy to keep your vault’s collateralization ratio below a certain level. This may be beneficial, for example, in a bull market where the value of your collateral is increasing. Find out more about how this works

auto-buy.set-trigger-description: You are creating a recurring Buy action to trigger at a collateralization ratio of {{execCollRatio}}%, Reducing it to your Target Ratio of {{targetCollRatio}}%. Initially it will execute with at ${{executionPrice}}/{{token}}, with a Max Buy price of ${{minBuyPrice}}/{{token}}. Learn More
auto-buy.set-trigger-description-no-threshold: You are creating a recurring Buy action to trigger at a collateralization ratio of {{execCollRatio}}%, Reducing it to your Target Ratio of {{targetCollRatio}}%. Initially it will execute with at ${{executionPrice}}/{{token}}. With no min buy price. Learn More

optimization.zero-debt-heading: You need to Generate DAI before you can set up Optimization
optimization.zero-debt-description: Oasis.app Optimization allows you to set up a dynamic Auto-Buy Strategy on your vault based on the collateralization ratio. This will increase your exposure to the collateral asset as the price increased. Learn more about how it works
optimization.adding-new-triggers-disabled: Creation of the new Optimization triggers is currently disabled.
optimization.adding-new-triggers-disabled-description: To protect our users, due to extreme adversarial market conditions we have currently disabled setting up NEW Optimization triggers

banner.content: Set up Constant Multiple to keep your vault's collateralization ratio within a range that you select

ref.banner: Refer a Friend. Earn DAI today
ref.intro-1: Refer someone to us and you both get rewarded with 5% of all fees they generate on Oasis.app... forever! Read more about
ref.explanation: Once someone clicks your referral link and accepts then you will see them appear in the “Accounts you’ve referred” below. Then you are all set, fee sharing is active! Your link is reusable as many times as you like.
ref.faq-link: Read more in Oasis Referral Guide
ref.you-were-not-referred: No account has referred you to Oasis.app
ref.how-p1-not-connected: 1. Connect your ETH wallet to Oasis.app
ref.how-p2: 2. Share your link with potential Oasis.app users
ref.how-p3: 3. Both receive 5% of the Oasis.app fees generated forever!

modal.you-have-been-ref: You have been invited to the Oasis.app Refer a Friend program by
modal.body-text: Oasis.app is the most trusted place to deploy capital into Defi. By joining our Refer a Friend program you:
modal.joined: You have successfully joined the Oasis.app Refer a Friend program.
modal.joined-body: You will now receive 5% of all fees that you generate on Oasis.app. You can now go directly to the Oasis.app homepage and start exploring products to deploy capital into Defi.
modal.successful-body: You will now receive 5% of all fees that they generate on Oasis.app. You can now go directly to the Oasis.app homepage or see your referral dashboard.
modal.successful-head: You have successfully referred  <1>{{referred}}</1> to the Oasis.app Refer a Friend program.
modal.successful-join: You have successfully joined the Oasis.app Refer a Friend program.

notifications.enable-notifications-email-description: You are able to receive the email updates on Oasis.app
notifications.email-entered: You have set up email notifcations successfully.
